# API Surface: init

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| executeStrategicInit | orchestrator | Main entry point orchestrating 6-phase strategic init flow: vision analysis, scaling goals, compliance detection, budget assessment, methodology selection, and repository selection | InitFlow.ts |
| VisionAnalyzer.analyze | analyzer | Analyzes product vision text to extract keywords, detect market category, identify competitors, calculate opportunity scores, and generate follow-up questions | research/VisionAnalyzer.ts |
| TeamRecommender.recommend | recommender | Recommends team structures based on compliance requirements, scale, and architecture needs with serverless alternatives | team/TeamRecommender.ts |
| ArchitectureDecisionEngine.decide | decision-engine | Generates architecture recommendations based on vision analysis and compliance requirements | architecture/ArchitectureDecisionEngine.ts |
| ServerlessSavingsCalculator.calculateSavings | calculator | Calculates potential monthly cost savings by using serverless alternatives for auth, file uploads, image processing, email, and background jobs | team/ServerlessSavingsCalculator.ts |
| ComplianceDetector.detect | detector | Detects compliance requirements (HIPAA, PCI-DSS, SOC2, GDPR, etc.) from vision text and market category | compliance/ComplianceDetector.ts |
